snippet: “The United States has always had a pretty sacred rule, and that is: we don’t leave our men or women in uniform behind,” President Obama said.
lead_paragraph: “The United States has always had a pretty sacred rule, and that is: we don’t leave our men or women in uniform behind,” President Obama said.

headline.main: Obama Defends Swap of Taliban for American P.O.W.
